long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extremely simple extension that does a single task: copy a newly generated GUID to your clipboard whenever you click it. Nothing else: no tracking added, no permission needed, no UI.

Source code available at: https://github.com/datvm/CopyAGuid/

(Pardon the screenshot, the extension has no UI at all except the button on the Extension toolbar)
